section.title: Volume attach error, not JSON serializable
Problem
section.para: When you attach a volume to a VM, you will see the error with stack trace in /var/log/cinder/volume.log. The JSON serializable issue is caused by an RPC response timeout.

section.title: Solution
section.para: Make sure your iptables allow port 3260 communication on the ISC controller. Run this command:

screen.userinput: iptables -I INPUT <Last Rule No> -p tcp --dport 3260 -j ACCEPT

section.para: If the port communication is properly configured, you can try running this command.

note.para: This service does not exist on Debian or Ubuntu.

section.para: If you continue to get the RPC response time out, your ISC controller and KVM host might be incompatible.
